name: Schemify.Kt
tagline: Schemification and serialization API for Kotlin
body:
# Sub APIs:
* [**Schemification API**](#schemification-api): Creating a scheme of a class.
* [**Serialization API**](#serialization-api): Transforming an instance of schemified class from / to other format.

***

## Schemification API
Structure of a class can be represented as a scheme by mapping class fields to scheme Props.  
_In this sense scheme is a special class that represent other class structure as set of props._  
_Example:_


***

## Serialization API
**Container** of **entries** represented in one **format** can be transformed to another format.  
_Examples:_
